    java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> UCertdbAppointmentDAO.findAllCustomerAppointments​(java.lang.String customerName)

    Methods in com.boslott.DataAccess with parameters of type Appointment
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean AppointmentDAO.insertAppointment​(Appointment newAppt)
    Inserts a new Appointment entry in the data source, populated with data from the newAppt object
    java.lang.Boolean UCertdbAppointmentDAO.insertAppointment​(Appointment newAppt)
    Inserts a new Appointment entry into the UCertify database with the data contained in the newAppt object
    java.lang.Boolean AppointmentDAO.updateAppointment​(Appointment apptToUpdate)
    Updates an existing Appointment entry in the data source, updated with data from the apptToUpdate object
    java.lang.Boolean UCertdbAppointmentDAO.updateAppointment​(Appointment apptToUpdate)
    Updates an Appointment entry in the UCertify database with the property values contained in the apptToUpdate object
